Articles.Content:
Hi!

Is there any way to remove the Kerbal workers that are walking around in VAB/SPH? I remember that there used be an option to hide them in the settings menu. But it seems that the options is gone now in 1.0.x.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-24T21:09:22Z" title="05/24/2015 09:09  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 24, 2015</time> by Nayeen**
It's on the first screen under settings. "Show space center crew."
Thanks! I was trying to find it from in-game settings menu while already in game.

Ok, I know this is 6ish years old, but...

**THANK YOU!!!****![;p](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/971609041_P.png ";p")**
